data.title: Sponsoring Almere City FC: #Football is our engine
data.meta_description: Almere, 12 November 2023 – Since 2015, Yanmar has proudly been the stadium sponsor of Almere City FC. This June, promotion to the Eredivisie, the Dutch premier league, marked a […]
data.text:
Almere, 12 November 2023 – Since 2015, Yanmar has proudly been the stadium sponsor of Almere City FC. This June, promotion to the Eredivisie, the Dutch premier league, marked a historic achievement for both the young club and the city of Almere. On November 12, during the blockbuster encounter with Ajax Amsterdam, Yanmar also served as a match sponsor. A spectacular Sunday at the Yanmar Stadium.

To heighten the excitement of the match, Yanmar showcased various tractors and excavators outside the stadium. This was warmly received by the supporters, as evident from the numerous photos and selfies taken. The enthusiasm was further fueled by the distribution of Yanmar goodies with FunGuns to the audience before the match.

Eagerness, power, and ambition

Almere City proved to be a worthy opponent for Ajax, displaying eagerness, power, and ambition. The sensational match concluded with a 2-2 draw, a fair result, and a notable outcome for the young Almere City players against the established Ajax.

Football is our engine

The sponsorship of Almere City aligns perfectly with Yanmar’s global passionate commitment to sports sponsorship, particularly in football and watersports. Additionally, Almere City FC represents the place where Yanmar Europe has been active for over 30 years.

Just as our engines form the pillar of our business, we believe that sports, especially football, can serve as the ‘driving force’ behind realizing a prosperous society and connecting people. Therefore, we say: #Football is our engine.

About Yanmar

With beginnings in Osaka, Japan, in 1912, Yanmar was the first ever to succeed in making a compact diesel engine of a practical size in 1933. A pioneer in diesel engine technology, Yanmar is a global innovator in a wide range of industrial equipment, from small and large engines, agricultural machinery and facilities, construction equipment, energy systems, marine, to machine tools, and components — Yanmar’s global business operations span seven domains. On land, at sea, and in the city, Yanmar provides advanced solutions to the challenges customers face, towards realizing A Sustainable Future.
